name: Snow igloo in the Zillergrund
description:
The Zillergrund tributary valley in the Mayrhofen-Hippach holiday region in Zillertal is a true natural gem. 

Take a relaxing stroll through the snow-covered, pristine natural landscapes whilst admiring the ice chapel with ice queen, artful snow crystals as well as a super-size ice cube.
Kinderwelt (Children's World) in Zillergrund offers families with children loads of fun in the snow with a mini igloo, snow cave and snowy hills to slide and sled down.

Häusling und Klaushof guesthouses offer welcome and warming refreshments after your walk. 

Opening Times & Taxi Shuttle Service
Zillergrund Winter Magic is open daily during the day, as well as on Wednesday and Thursday evenings.

From 21st December, a taxi shuttle service will be operating on Wednesday and Thursday evenings.The taxi departs from Europahaus Mayrhofen on both evenings at 17.30 hrs and takes visitors to Gasthof Klaushof and returns from Häusling Alm or Klaushof at either 20.00 hrs or 21.00 hrs. The return taxi trip COSTS € 12.00 - children under the age of 6 years go free. Registrations should be made on the day of the intended visit by no later than 12.00 noon at Mayrhofen-Hippach Tourist Board (+43 5285 6760).
